TITLE.P: Expressions of Interest re supply of animation for events

SHORT_DESCR.P: Derry City and Strabane District Council is seeking expressions of interest from suitably qualified individuals/organisations for the supply of a range of animation services for Festivals & Events within the Council area during 2018/19 and 2019/20.

TITLE.P: Creative or interactive installations, displays or shows

SHORT_DESCR.P: Derry City and Strabane District Council is seeking expressions of interest from suitably qualified individuals/organisations for the supply of a range of animation services for Festivals & Events within the Council area during 2018/19 and 2019/20.
Brief.
Derry City and Strabane District Council (DCSDC) has established a public outdoor events programme from 4.2018 until 31.3.2020 which will include a number of major events throughout the year.

We anticipate additional public events and celebrations to be programmed on an ad hoc basis. These events may vary in nature, scale and requirements. We are seeking a range of animation services in keeping with target audiences and themes for individual events and festivals.

Please note that Derry and Strabane District Council are also encouraging animation proposals for the City Walls from 10.2018 until 3.2019 to complement festival programmes delivered in this period in recognition of the 400th anniversary of the walls and as part of the ‘Walls Alive’ programme of events and celebrations being created in recognition of this anniversary.

SUITABILITY.P: The Applicant must comply with all applicable fair employment, equality of treatment and anti-discrimination legislation as a condition to the performance of the contract. The contract will be subject to conditions so that the Contracting Authority and the Constituent Councils can comply with their statutory duty to have due regard to the need to promote equality of opportunity as set out in Section 75 of the Northern Ireland Act 1998 and Schedule 9 of the Act and with their statutory duty to contribute to the achievement of sustainable development as set out in Section 25 of the Northern Ireland (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2006.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: The High Courts of Justice of Northern Ireland
ADDRESS_REVIEW_BODY.ADDRESS: The Royal Courts of Justice, Chichester Street
